seniority_level.evidence: Job description requires a minimum of 10 years experience and explicitly labels the role as Senior.

job_family.evidence: Title and responsibilities focus on enterprise data warehouse modeling, conceptual/logical/physical design, and Kimball dimensional modeling, which aligns with a data architect role.

sub_specialty.evidence: Core duties are building conceptual, logical, and physical data models, dimensional modeling, and schema design (star, snowflake, hybrid).

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentors and educates team members, provides technical leadership of an Oracle data warehouse team, but no direct reports are mentioned.

primary_cloud.evidence: Only Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) is referenced, which is not among the allowed cloud categories (aws, azure, gcp, multi, on_prem).

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers are mentioned in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Responsibilities include ETL activities, data warehouse implementation, and dimensional modeling—typical batch processing workloads.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Luigi, dbt, etc.) are referenced.

storage_layer.evidence: Focus on enterprise data warehouse, star/snowflake/hybrid schemas, and Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse.

remote_restriction.evidence: Must live within 60 miles of Sacramento, CA and hybrid work requires two days in‑office.

timezone_focus.evidence: Location is in California, USA, implying a focus on the Americas time zones.

relocation_required.evidence: Candidate must already reside within 60 miles of the job site; no relocation is offered.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is listed as not_mentioned in the extraction.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of OPT/CPT eligibility; work authorization is implied for existing residents.

citizenship_required.evidence: Requirement is to be a resident within 60 miles; no citizenship restriction is stated.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Job title includes "W2" indicating a full‑time employee arrangement.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting mentions senior level and mentoring but provides no explicit career ladder or promotion tracks.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Responsibilities include mentoring and educating team members, indicating informal mentorship.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotion, advancement, or career ladders appears in the posting.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The description does not reference internal transfers or mobility programs.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are mentioned.

requirement_strictness.evidence: The posting lists many mandatory hard and soft skills, specific years of experience, and detailed technology requirements.

scope_definition.evidence: The role is narrowly defined around data modeling for an enterprise data warehouse.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skills and experience align with a senior‑level data modeling position; no unrealistic expectations are evident.
